John Indi bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri a maara maka ọrụ ya na A Far Off Place (1993), Mandela, na Incident at Victoria Falls (1992)
Indi na nwunye ya na-eme ihe nkiri Kubi Indi, malitere ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ngwaahịa mara mma nke dị na Africa.
Mgbe Zimbabwe nweere onwe ya, Indi na nwunye ya Chaza laghachiri na mba ahụ
N'ebe ahụ, ha malitere ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe mara mma a na-akpọ Kubi Cosmetics nke bụ ugbu a akara a ma ama na Southern Africa
Ọ na-emepụta ngwaahịa ndị kpọmkwem maka akpụkpọ na ntutu isi Africa.

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke dọkịta amoosu na ihe nkiri afọ 1982 Shamwari nke Ian Yule na Ken Gampu gosipụtara. O nwere ọrụ dị mkpa, na-arụ ọrụ Oliver Tambo na ihe nkiri TV Mandela nke e wepụtara n'afọ 1987. Ọrụ ọzọ a ma ama o nwere bụ ịkwụ ụgwọ maka akụkụ Khumalo na ihe nkiri Bill Corcoran duziri Incident at Victoria Falls nke e wepụtara n'afọ 1992. Ọ pụtara dịka Bamuthi na ihe nkiri njem nke afọ 1993, A Far Off Place nke Mikael Salomon duziri
O nwere òkè na Ruggero Deodato's Sotto il cielo dell'Africa aka Thinking About Africa nke e wepụtara n'afọ  1999.
A makwaara ya nke ọma dị ka onye na-ese okwu ma mee mgbasa ozi ole na ole maka Chicken Licken yana Kiwi Shoe polish.
